project_level: 12 distilled water blanks | 2 PCR no-template controls | 7 extraction blanks | 12 2nd PCR no-template controls

example: Sampling bottles were rinsed with 10% bleached and DI water. Single-use syringes and capsule filters were used for filtration. Single-use gloves were used to collect and filter each sample.
project_level: After sampling, run ~1 L of 5% bleach through tubing lines, then repeat with ~1 L of deionized water. Rinse the 20-L collection carboy 3 times with ~0.5 L DI water (1.5 L total) after sampling. Before the next sample, rinse 20-L carboy 2 times with ~100 mL of sample water (200 mL total).

ssu16sv4v5: 16S rRNA gene sequencing targeting the V4-V5 region using primers 515F and 926R
ssu18sv9: 18S rRNA gene sequencing targeting the V9 region using primers 1391f and EukBr”

example: Luna® Universal qPCR Master Mix, New England Biolabs
project_level: AmpliTaq Gold 360 Master Mix, Thermo Fisher Scientific

example: Each PCR reaction comprised: 1 x Taq Gold buffer (Applied Biosystems [ABI], USA), 2 nM MgCl2 (ABI, USA), 0.4 mg/mL BSA (Fisher Biotec, Australia), 0.25 mM dNTPs (Astral Scientific, Australia), 0.4 μM each of forward and reverse primers (Integrated DNA Technologies, Australia), 0.6 μL of 1/10,000 SYBR Green dye (Life Technologies, USA), 1 U of Taq polymerase Gold (ABI, USA), 2 μL of DNA, and made up to 25 μL with PCR grade water
ssu16sv4v5: PCR reactions were run in triplicate (13.0 µl), with 1 µl of DNA per reaction, 5 µl of AmpliTaq Gold, 6.25 µl of water, and 0.375 µl of each primer (10 µM).
ssu18sv9: PCR reactions were run in triplicate (13.0 µl), with 1 µl of DNA per reaction, 5 µl of AmpliTaq Gold, 6.5 µl of water, and 0.25 µl of each primer (10 µM).

example: Blocking primer (TAGTATAGCTACGAAGCCGAGGAGG-c3) (Wilcox et al. 2014, DOI 10.1007/s12686-013-0113-4) was applied to prevent elongation of a closely related species

example: The library was size selected using a Pippin-Prep (Sage Science, Beverly, USA), purified using the Qiaquick PCR Purification Kit (Qiagen), quantified using a Qubit (Invitrogen) and diluted to 2 nM before loading it onto a MiSeq Flow Cell

example: Unpublished custom database, containing COI sequences of 209 fish species collected from Western Australia (study area)

controlled_vocabulary_options: sequence similarity | sequence composition | phylogeny | probabilistic | other

example: Taxonomic levels were dropped to the lowest common ancestor (LCA) with the similarity thresholds of 99%, and also based on % identify thresholds (>98% species, 95-98% genus, 90-95% family).
Taxa detected in negative controls were checked, and the read counts were applied as a cutoff to call presence.
Distribution information was checked using FishBase, and species that did not reside in the study area were removed.

Non-targeted species (i.e. domestic animals, humans and non-marine species) were removed from the curated OTU table and downstream data analyses. OTUs that were assigned to species in WoRMS were kept in the curated OTU table.
The min_reads_cutoff was 1 read, but singletons were kept if the same sequence was detected in multiple samples. Data was curated using r-package LULU, minimum_mismatch cutoff 90%
